mapper.sql: id, title, schoolyear, term, activitycatalog, activitytype, create_time, author, dep, modify_time

id,
title,
schoolyear,
term,
activitycatalog,
activitytype,

modify_time,

ini_content,

mapper.update:
update job_activity_summary
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schoolyear = #{schoolyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
term = #{term,jdbcType=CHAR},
activitycatalog = #{activitycatalog,jdbcType=CHAR},
activitytype = #{activitytype,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dep = #{dep,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
ini_content = #{iniContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update job_activity_summary set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schoolyear = #{schoolyear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, term = #{term,jdbcType=CHAR}, activitycatalog = #{activitycatalog,jdbcType=CHAR}, activitytype = #{activitytype,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep = #{dep,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ini_content = #{iniContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
